mapper.sql: a.transfer_channel_id AS "transferChannelId", a.transfer_channel_name AS "transferChannelName", a.state AS "state", a.order_seq AS "orderSeq", a.differ_agio AS "differAgio"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_transfer_channel_config( transfer_channel_id, transfer_channel_name, state, order_seq, differ_agio ) VALUES ( #{transferChannelId}, #{transferChannelName}, #{state}, #{orderSeq}, #{differAgio} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_transfer_channel_config SET transfer_channel_id = #{transferChannelId}, transfer_channel_name = #{transferChannelName}, state = #{state}, order_seq = #{orderSeq}, differ_agio = #{differAgio} WHERE id = #{id}
